title: Render paths to nupkg for outputs when we have taskitem data
body:
Fixes part of https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/9608 for NuGet packages

### Context

Very small change, based off of the mechanism in https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9805, but with the same weakness - we only get task item metadata when `/m:1` in the central node. We need a proper forwarding logger.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c5367ce7-304e-41f2-86fe-002868aaaad2)


### Changes Made


### Testing


### Notes

commit.message: add nupkg file links when we have TaskItem output data
